mapper.select: SELECT c.chatId, c.itemId, i.itemName FROM Chat c JOIN Item i ON c.itemId = i.itemId -- Item 테이블에서 itemName 가져오기 WHERE i.itemId IN (SELECT itemId FROM Participation WHERE userId = #{userId}) OR c.itemId IN (SELECT itemId FROM Item WHERE userId = #{userId}) -- 사용자가 등록한 아이템 포함 ORDER BY c.chatId DESC
SELECT c.chatId, c.itemId, i.itemName FROM Chat c JOIN Item i ON c.itemId = i.itemId WHERE c.chatId = #{chatId}
